titleStmt.title: An introduction to a breviary of the history of England with the reign of King William the I, entitled the Conqueror / written by Sr. Walter Raleigh, Kt. ...
titleStmt.author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
Daniel, Samuel, 1562-1619.
Van Hove, Frederick Hendrick.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sam. Keble ... and Dan. Brown ...,

notesStmt.note: Running title: The reign of William the I.

The introduction (p. 1-24) may have been written by Raleigh; the breviary (p. 24-77) appears to be an epitome of a section of Daniel's The collection of the history of England, but may antedate it. Cf. Brushfield, T.N. Bibliography of Sir Walter Raleigh, 1908.
Portrait of Raleigh signed: F.H. van Hove.
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
